files.title: Overview
files.summary: The *program order* relates all operations performed by a thread to the order in which a sequential processor will execute instructions in the corresponding PTX source. It is a transitive relation that forms a total order over the operations performed by the thread, but does not relate operations...

files.title: 8.9.1.1. Asynchronous Operations
files.summary: Some PTX instructions (all variants of `cp.async`, `cp.async.bulk`, `cp.reduce.async.bulk`, `wgmma.mma_async`) perform operations that are asynchronous to the thread that executed the instruction. These asynchronous operations are ordered after prior instructions in the same thread (except in the...
